title: ClickTight Convertibles: Removing the Cover
description: How to remove the cover from the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.

asset.author: Britax Child Safety, Inc
asset.hookText:
How to remove the cover from the Britax Marathon ClickTight, Boulevard ClickTight, and Advocate ClickTight convertible car seats. **Refer to your user guide for complete installation instructions.
For more information about Britax ClickTight convertible car seats, visit http://www.britaxusa.com/clicktight-convertibles

transcripts: Loosen the harness unbuckle it and open the click tight. Remove the harness buckle by pulling the buckle retainer away from the seat bottom and turning it sideways. Route the buckle retainer through the buckle slot and cover to the top of the seat. Remove the buckle from the  belly pad by turning the buckle retainer sideways and routing it out of the belly pad. Open the click tight and disconnect the elastic from the bottom of the seating area. Hold the front of the seat pad from around the front of the seat and the click tight vessel. Remove it from the seat. Remove the comfort pads pull the bottom of the head pad to the front of the harness straps. Raise the harness to the top position. From the back of the head restraint disconnect the elastic from around the height adjust handle and from the hooks at the bottom of the head restraint. Pull the head pad off of the head restraint and set aside. Starting at the inside back corner pull the cover off around the seat. Gently pull the cover from behind the gray belt guides and up off of the child seat edges. Disconnect the elastic loops from the hooks at the inner front corners of the child seat. Continue to pull the cover off from around the other side of the seat until it's completely removed. Set the cover aside and close the click tight. Starting at the bottom edge of the side cover pull the covers edge from around the bottom of the inner cushion and from around the seat until completely removed.
